item.title: See-Saw Modality Balance: See Gradient, and Sew Impaired Vision-Language Balance to Mitigate Dominant Modality Bias
item.description: BALGRAD mitigates dominant modality bias in vision-language models by reweighting gradients and aligning task directions for balanced learning and improved performance.
